title: Kapuaʻala Sproat honored with international environmental teaching award (The University of Hawaii System)
text: ( Source : The University of Hawaii System ) Kapua Sproat University of Hawaiʻi William S. Richardson School of Law Associate Professor D. Kapuaʻala Sproat has been recognized with a major international award for her expertise in environmental
